title: Trump Tweets
description: I created this game during my first semester of multimedia design at KEA. I am especially proud of this project, as it was my first time really diving into javascript. Coming up with the concept, creating the artwork, deciding on and coding the game mechanics and recording audio was such a fun and rewarding process.

title: Pumpkin Configurator
description: I created this configurator in collaboration with my classmate Carolyne Green. The goal of this project was to build a configurator where the user could color different sections of an image with the help of svg paths and add additional elements.

title: Hogwarts Student List
description: This project was an exercise in handling and manipulating json data. Try toggling the candles on the page to find the secret combination that will hack the student list.

title: Silfen Website
description: Group project for Danish handbag company Silfen. We created a full digital marketing campaign and website.

title: BYU Studio Website
description: This site was part of my second semester exam project.

title: Exam Portfolio
description: I created this portfolio site as part of my first semester exam. I wanted to show off the products of the 4 main themes we had gone through, while keeping a consistent design and showing off some animation.

title: My First Website
description: This was the first free assignment during my studies at KEA. I decided to play with a collage effect of layered images and since I am a big fan of tea that became my topic.

title: Logo Pane & Unicinetto
description: I created this logo for the Italian blog Pane & Uncinetto. The blog can be found on Instagram and Facebook with the handle @paneeduncinetto or on their website www.paneeduncinetto.com
